sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps"> <x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <app_id/> <category>secops_sir</category> <comments>ntegrating ServiceNowÂ® Security Incident Response with the Microsoft Exchange Online service, part of the Microsoft Office 365 suite of products, provides a security operations center (SOC) analyst with an email search and delete capability. With this integration, your SOC analyst can search your corporate email environment for security-related threats and remove phishing emails.</comments> <install_key>032838c30b2332009f66e94685673aa8</install_key> <name>Microsoft Exchange Online for Security Operations</name> <number>CICD0001054</number> <status>evaluate</status> <sys_created_by>wzbsza</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-07-16 08:34:24</sys_created_on> <sys_id>e8833ba797dfc214b4b27ca0f053afad</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>wzbsza</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-07-16 08:44:41</sys_updated_on> <type>application</type> <version>10.5.4</version> </x_275773_sta_cicd_cicd_install_apps> </record_update>
